content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #117

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Define context

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Overview
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Define context

Comment: In the sentence "The subscring app may query a session's current context and initiate context changes by accessing APIs exposed by the Hub"

define "context". This will provide a better understanding to the reader.

Existing wording: The subscring app may query a session's current context and initiate context changes by accessing APIs exposed by the Hub

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #117:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
